quote: Pleasure can be supported by an illusion; but happiness rests upon truth.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress: Working hard for something we love is called passion.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Death is as sure for that which is born, as birth is for that which is dead. Therefore grieve not for what is inevitable.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
author: Bob Marley

quote: If it is not right, do not do it, if it is not true, do not say it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid?
author: Spencer Johnson

quote: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Trying to predict the future is like trying to drive down a country road at night with no lights while looking out the back window.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard
